attributes.action: Allow an option to vote "No Confidence" in general elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If one does not believe that any of the parties vying for government are likely to be a benefit to the nation, one's only option is to abstain from voting, which merely gives an appearance of apathy.
There should be an option on the electoral forms to allow voters to state that they have no confidence in any of the parties, and publication of the percentage of voters who voted no confidence should be obligatory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
